DIF.Entry_Title: GLAS/ICESat L2 Global Aerosol Vertical Structure Data (HDF5)

Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Creator: Zwally, H. J., R. Schutz, D. Hancock, and J. Dimarzio.
Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Title: GLAS/ICESat L2 Global Aerosol Vertical Structure Data (HDF5)
Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Publisher: NASA NSIDC DAAC: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center

Source_Name.Long_Name: Ice, Cloud and Land Elevation Satellite

Project.Long_Name: Ice, Cloud and Land Elevation Satellite

DIF.Quality: Each data granule has associated browse products that users can quickly view to determine the general quality of the data in the granule.

Data_Center_Name.Long_Name: NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center

Contact_Address.Address: National Snow and Ice Data Center

Summary.Abstract: GLAH10 Level-2 aerosol vertical structure data contain the attenuation-corrected cloud and aerosol backscatter and extinction profiles at a 4 sec sampling rate for aerosols and a 1 sec rate for clouds. Each data granule has an associated browse product.

Related_URL.Description: ICESat/GLAS web site at NASA Wallops Flight Facility
ICESat/GLAS web site at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center
ICESat/GLAS web site at University of Texas

DIF.DIF_Revision_History:
2013-03-04, Deann Miller, New HDF5 data set. 2013-03-04, Deann Miller, New HDF5 data set. 2014-02-21, Daniel Webster, Removed GLAS Subsetter from Data Access URLs list. Subsetter for GLAS HDF5 data is not available yet.
2013-03-06, Daniel Webster, Updated Version Summary. 2015-07-22, Michon Scott, Added keyword as part of Drupal migration. 2015-09-17, Daniel Webster, Revised Spatial Resolution, Temporal Resolution, and Platforms, and removed Order Data URL, for Landing Page / EDB cleanup. 2015-09-28, Daniel Webster, Added HTTPS URL to Data Access.

Metadata.Name: Version Summary
Metadata.Value: For information about Version 33, see the NSIDC ICESat Description of Data Releases page.
